00065 //Get Profile after smearing
00066 TGraph *GetProfile(RooRealVar *var, RooSmearer& compatibility, int level=-1, bool warningEnable=false, bool trueEval=true, float rho=0, float Emean=0, float phi=0);
00067 
00068 TGraph *GetProfile(RooRealVar *var1, RooRealVar *var2, RooSmearer& smearer, bool trueEval=true, double rho=0, double Emean=0, float phi=0){
00069   if(var2==NULL) return GetProfile(var1, smearer, -1, false, trueEval, rho, Emean);
00070 
00071   Double_t v1 = var1->getVal();
00072   Double_t v2 = var2->getVal();
00073 
00074   TGraph *g1 = GetProfile(var1, smearer, -1, false, false, rho, Emean, phi); // take only the binning    
00075   TGraph *g2 = GetProfile(var2, smearer, -1, false, false, rho, Emean, phi); // take only the binning
00076   TGraph *g3 = (rho!=0) ?  GetProfile(NULL, smearer, -1, false, false, rho, Emean, phi) : GetProfile(var1, smearer, -1, false, false, rho, Emean, phi); // take only the binning
00077 
00078   Double_t      *X1    = g1->GetX();
00079   Double_t      *X2    = g2->GetX();
00080   Int_t          N     = g1->GetN();
00081   Double_t *Y = g3->GetY();
00082 
00083   if(N!=g2->GetN()){
00084     std::cerr << "[ERROR] N1!=N2 for phi minimization: " << N << "\t"<<g2->GetN() << std::endl;
00085     exit(1);
00086   }
00087 
00088   for(Int_t i=0; i < N; i++){ // reset Y values
00089     var1->setVal(X1[i]);
00090     var2->setVal(X2[i]);
00091     Y[i]=smearer.evaluate();
00092   }
00093 
00094   var1->setVal(v1);
00095   var2->setVal(v2);
00096 
00097   delete g1;
00098   delete g2;
00099   return g3;
00100 }
00101 
00102 TGraph *GetProfile(RooRealVar *var, RooSmearer& compatibility, int level, bool warningEnable, bool trueEval, float rho, float Emean, float phi){
00103   if(var==NULL) trueEval=false;
00104   TString name(var == NULL ? "phi" : var->GetName());
00105   //if(trueEval) 
00106   std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting profile for " << name << "\t" << level << "\t" << trueEval << "\t" << rho << "\t" << Emean << std::endl;
00107   double minValue= var==NULL? 0 : var->getVal();
00108   //double minYvalue=compatibility.evaluate();
00109 
00110   double bin_width=0., sigma=0.;
00111   double range_min = var ==NULL ? 0      : var->getMin();
00112   double range_max = var ==NULL ? M_PI_2 : var->getMax();
00113   if(Emean!=0){
00114     range_min =  0     ;
00115     range_max =  M_PI_2;
00116   }
00117 
00118   int nBin=0;
00119   switch(level){
00120   case -1:
00121     return GetProfile(var, compatibility, 5,false,false,rho, Emean);
00122     break;
00123   case 0:
00124     TGraph *g1; g1 =GetProfile(var, compatibility, 1,false);
00125     TGraph *g2; g2 =GetProfile(var, compatibility, 2,false);
00126     TGraph *g3; g3 =GetProfile(var, compatibility, 4,false);
00127     Double_t X[PROFILE_NBINS], Y[PROFILE_NBINS];
00128 
00129     Int_t N_; N_=g1->GetN();
00130     Double_t *X_, *Y_; X_=g1->GetX(); Y_=g1->GetY();
00131 
00132     for(Int_t i=0; i < N_; i++){
00133       X[i]=X_[i];
00134       Y[i] =Y_[i];
00135     }
00136     nBin=N_;
00137     N_=g2->GetN();
00138     X_=g2->GetX(); Y_=g2->GetY();
00139     
00140     for(Int_t i=0; i < N_; i++){
00141       X[i+nBin]=X_[i];
00142       Y[i+nBin] =Y_[i];
00143     }
00144     nBin+=N_;
00145 
00146     N_=g3->GetN();
00147     X_=g3->GetX(); Y_=g3->GetY();
00148     for(Int_t i=0; i < N_; i++){
00149       X[i+nBin]=X_[i];
00150       Y[i+nBin] =Y_[i];
00151     }
00152     nBin+=N_;
00153     return  new TGraph(nBin,X,Y);
00154 
00155     break;
00156   
00157   case 1:
00158     if(name.Contains("scale")){
00159       bin_width=0.005;
00160     } else if(name.Contains("const")|| (rho==0 && Emean!=0)){
00161       bin_width=0.005;
00162     } else if(name.Contains("alpha")){
00163       bin_width=0.01;
00164     } 
00165     if((var==NULL || name.Contains("alpha") || name.Contains("const")) && (Emean!=0 && rho!=0)) bin_width=0.025;
00166     break;
00167   case 2:
00168     if(name.Contains("scale")){
00169       bin_width=0.0005; // level1/10
00170       sigma=10*bin_width;    //
00171     }else  if(name.Contains("const")|| (rho==0 && Emean!=0)){
00172       bin_width=0.0005; //level1/10
00173       sigma=10*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00174     } else if(name.Contains("alpha")){
00175         bin_width=0.005;
00176         sigma=5*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00177     } 
00178 
00179     if((var==NULL || name.Contains("alpha") || name.Contains("const")) && (Emean!=0 && rho!=0)) bin_width=0.025;
00180     //sigma=var->getError();
00181     range_min = std::max(range_min, minValue -  sigma);
00182     range_max = std::min(range_max, minValue +  sigma);
00183     break;
00184   case 3:
00185     if(name.Contains("scale")){
00186       bin_width=0.0001;     // level2/5
00187       sigma=8*bin_width;    // 
00188     }else  if(name.Contains("const") || (rho==0 && Emean!=0)){
00189       bin_width=0.0002;    // level2 /3
00190       sigma=6*bin_width;    
00191     } else if(name.Contains("alpha")){
00192         bin_width=0.003;
00193         sigma=5*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00194     } 
00195     //sigma=var->getError();
00196     range_min = std::max(range_min, minValue - sigma); //4sigma
00197     range_max = std::min(range_max, minValue + sigma);
00198     break;
00199   case 4:
00200     if(name.Contains("scale")){
00201       bin_width=0.0001; // level1/10
00202         sigma=5*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00203     }else  if(name.Contains("const")|| (rho==0 && Emean!=0)){
00204       bin_width=0.0001; //level1/10
00205         sigma=10*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00206     } else if(name.Contains("alpha")){
00207         bin_width=0.001;
00208         sigma=5*bin_width; // +/- 0.5%
00209     } 
00210     range_min = std::max(range_min, minValue - sigma); //4sigma
00211     range_max = std::min(range_max, minValue + sigma);
00212 
00213     break;
00214     
00215   case 5:
00216     if(name.Contains("scale")){
00217       bin_width=0.0001; // level1/10
00218     }else  if(name.Contains("const") || (rho==0 && Emean!=0)){
00219       bin_width=0.0001; //level1/10
00220     } else if(name.Contains("alpha")){
00221       bin_width=0.001;
00222     } 
00223     if((var==NULL || name.Contains("alpha") || name.Contains("const")) && (Emean!=0 && rho!=0)) bin_width=0.025;
00224     break;
00225 
00226   }
00227     if((var==NULL || name.Contains("alpha") || name.Contains("const")) && (Emean!=0)) bin_width=0.025;
00228     nBin=(int)((range_max-range_min)/bin_width);
00229     //    if(Emean!=0 && rho!=0) nBin=(int) (M_PI_2 / bin_width);
00230 
00231 #ifdef DEBUG
00232 
00233 #endif
00234     std::cout << "nBin = " << nBin << "\t" << bin_width << "\t" << Emean << "\t" << rho << std::endl;
00235 //     if(var->isConstant()==false){
00236 //       while(nBin <10 && nBin>1){
00237 //       //std::cout << "[INFO] Updating from range: " << nBin << "\t" << range_min << "\t" << range_max << std::endl;
00238 //       bin_width*=0.9;
00239 //       range_min = std::max(var->getMin(),bin_width*((floor)(range_min / bin_width))- bin_width);
00240 //       range_max = std::min(var->getMax(),bin_width*((floor)(range_max / bin_width))+ bin_width);
00241 //       nBin=(int)((range_max-range_min)/bin_width);
00242 //       //std::cout << "[INFO] Updating to range: " << nBin << "\t" << range_min << "\t" << range_max << std::endl;
00243 //       if(nBin <=0){
00244 //      std::cout << "[ERROR] NBins < 10" << std::endl;
00245 //      exit(1);
00246 //       }
00247 //     }
00248 //     while(nBin >40 && level<4 && level > 0){
00249 //       bin_width*=1.1;
00250 //       range_min = bin_width*((floor)(range_min / bin_width));
00251 //       range_max = bin_width*((floor)(range_max / bin_width));
00252 //       nBin=(int)((range_max-range_min)/bin_width);
00253 //     }
00254 //     }
00255    double chi2[PROFILE_NBINS];
00256    double xValues[PROFILE_NBINS];
00257    if(trueEval) std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00258   for (int iVal=0;iVal<nBin;++iVal)
00259     {
00260       double value = range_min+bin_width*iVal;
00261       if(rho!=0 && Emean!=0){
00262         if(name.Contains("alpha")) value=rho*Emean*cos(bin_width*iVal);
00263         if(name.Contains("const")) value=rho*sin(bin_width*iVal);
00264         //std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << "\t" << rho << "\t" << Emean << "\t" << bin_width << "\t" << bin_width*iVal << "\t" << value << std::endl;
00265       }
00266       if(rho==0 && Emean!=0){
00267         if(name.Contains("alpha")) value=value*Emean*cos(phi);
00268         if(name.Contains("const")) value=value*sin(phi);
00269         //std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << "\t" << rho << "\t" << Emean << "\t" << bin_width << "\t" << bin_width*iVal << "\t" << value << std::endl;
00270       }
00271       
00272 #ifdef DEBUG
00273       std::cout << "testing function @ " << value << std::endl;
00274 #endif
00275 
00276       xValues[iVal]=value;
00277       if(trueEval){
00278         var->setVal(value);
00279         chi2[iVal]=compatibility.evaluate(); //-minYvalue;
00280       } else chi2[iVal]=0;
00281 #ifdef DEBUG
00282       if(trueEval) std::cout << "value is " << chi2[iVal] << std::endl;
00283 #endif
00284     }
00285   if(trueEval){
00286     std::cout << name << "\tlevel=" << level << "; nBins=" << nBin << "; range_min=" << range_min << "; range_max=" << range_max << "; bin_width=" << bin_width << "\t";
00287     std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00288   }
00289 
00290   if(var!=NULL) var->setVal(minValue);
00291   TGraph *profil = new TGraph(nBin,xValues,chi2);
00292   return profil;
00293 }

00295 TTree *dataset2tree(RooDataSet *dataset){
00296 
00297   const RooArgSet *args = dataset->get();
00298   RooArgList argList(*args);
00299 
00300   Double_t variables[50];
00301   Long64_t nEntries= dataset->numEntries();
00302   //nEntries=1;
00303   TTree *tree = new TTree("tree","tree");
00304   tree->SetDirectory(0);
00305   TIterator *it1=NULL; 
00306   it1 = argList.createIterator();
00307   int index1=0;
00308   for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) it1->Next(); var!=NULL;
00309       var = (RooRealVar *) it1->Next(),index1++){
00310     TString name(var->GetName());
00311     name.ReplaceAll("-","_");
00312     tree->Branch(name, &(variables[index1]), name+"/D");
00313   }
00314 
00315   //  tree->Print();
00316 
00317   for(Long64_t jentry=0; jentry<nEntries; jentry++){
00318     
00319     TIterator *it=NULL; 
00320     RooArgList argList1(*(dataset->get(jentry)));
00321     it = argList1.createIterator();
00322     //(dataset->get(jentry))->Print();
00323     int index=0;
00324     for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); var!=NULL;
00325         var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(), index++){
00326       variables[index]=var->getVal();
00327       //var->Print();
00328     }
00329    
00330     delete it;
00331     tree->Fill();
00332   }
00333 
00334   //  tree->Print();
00335   return tree;
00336 }

00362 #ifdef MCMC
00363 bool MinMCMC2D(RooRealVar *var1, RooRealVar *var2, RooSmearer& smearer, int iProfile, 
00364                Double_t min_old, Double_t& min, long unsigned int nIter, bool update=true){ 
00365   Double_t chi2, chi2init=smearer.evaluate(); 
00366   bool changed=false;
00367 
00368   TStopwatch myClock;
00369   myClock.Start();
00370 
00371   Double_t v1=var1->getVal();
00372   Double_t v2=var2->getVal();
00373 
00374   // fix the scales to constant!
00375   RooArgSet floatingVars;
00376   RooArgList     argList_(smearer.GetParams());
00377   TIterator     *it_ = argList_.createIterator();
00378   for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next(); var != NULL; var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next()){
00379     if (var->isConstant() || !var->isLValue()) continue;
00380     TString  name(var->GetName());
00381     if(name!=var1->GetName() && name!=var2->GetName()){
00382       floatingVars.add(*var);
00383       var->setConstant();
00384     }
00385   }
00386   delete it_;
00387 
00388   //creating MCMC proposal
00389   RooStats::ProposalHelper ph;
00390   ph.SetVariables(smearer.GetParams());
00391   if(iProfile>1){
00392     ph.SetCovMatrix(*smearer._markov.GetAsDataSet()->covarianceMatrix(smearer.GetParams())); 
00393     ph.SetUniformFraction(0.2/iProfile);
00394     if(iProfile==2) ph.SetWidthRangeDivisor(5);
00395     if(iProfile==3) ph.SetWidthRangeDivisor(20);
00396   }else{
00397     ph.SetUniformFraction(1);
00398     ph.SetWidthRangeDivisor(1);
00399   }
00400 
00401   //running the mcmc
00402   RooStats::MetropolisHastings MCMC(smearer, smearer.GetParams(), *(ph.GetProposalFunction()), (Int_t)nIter);
00403   MCMC.SetNumBurnInSteps(10);
00404   MCMC.SetSign(RooStats::MetropolisHastings::kNegative);
00405   MCMC.SetType(RooStats::MetropolisHastings::kLog);
00406   RooStats::MarkovChain *mcChain = (MCMC.ConstructChain());
00407 
00408   //taking the results
00409   RooDataSet *dataset = mcChain->GetAsDataSet();
00410   TTree *tree=dataset2tree(dataset);
00411   TString nllVarName=mcChain->GetNLLVar()->GetName();
00412   chi2= tree->GetMinimum(nllVarName);
00413   std::cout << "[DEBUG] chi2 = tree->GetMinimum(nllVarName): " << chi2 << std::endl;
00414   TString selMin=nllVarName+" == "; selMin+=chi2;
00415   
00416   tree->Draw(">>entrylist",selMin,"entrylist");
00417   TEntryList *entrylist=(TEntryList*) gROOT->FindObject("entrylist");
00418   if(entrylist->GetN()!=1){
00419     std::cout << "Entrylist N=" << entrylist->GetN() << std::endl;
00420     return "";
00421   }
00422   Long64_t minEntry = entrylist->GetEntry(0);
00423   
00424   TString var1Name=var1->GetName(); var1Name.ReplaceAll("-","_");
00425   TString var2Name=var2->GetName(); var2Name.ReplaceAll("-","_");
00426 
00427   TObjArray *branchArray = tree->GetListOfBranches();
00428   for(int i=0; i < branchArray->GetEntriesFast(); i++){
00429     TBranch *b= (TBranch *) branchArray->At(i);
00430     TString name=b->GetName();
00431     if(name!=var1Name && name!=var2Name) continue;
00432     Double_t address;
00433     b->SetAddress(&address);
00434     b->GetEntry(minEntry);
00435     if(name==var1Name) var1->setVal(address);
00436     else var2->setVal(address);
00437   }
00438 
00439   chi2=smearer.evaluate(); // local minimum
00440 
00441   if(chi2<chi2init){
00442     if(chi2<min) min=chi2;
00443     if(update==true){// && (min<min_old)){
00444       std::cout << "[INFO] Updating variables:" << std::endl
00445                 << "       " << var1->GetName() << "\t" << var1->getVal() << std::endl
00446                 << "       " << var2->GetName() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << std::endl
00447                 << "       " << min-chi2init << "\t" << chi2-chi2init << "\t" << chi2init << std::endl;
00448       changed=true;
00449     } else {
00450       if(chi2<chi2init) std::cout << "[INFO] New minimum found but not updating" << std::endl;
00451       
00452       std::cout << "[INFO] Not-updating variables:" << std::endl
00453                 << "       " << var1->GetName() << "\t" << var1->getVal() << std::endl
00454                 << "       " << var2->GetName() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << std::endl
00455                 << "       " << min-chi2init << "\t" << chi2-chi2init << std::endl;
00456       var1->setVal(v1);
00457       var2->setVal(v2);
00458       std::cout
00459         << "       " << var1->GetName() << "\t" << var1->getVal() << std::endl
00460         << "       " << var2->GetName() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << std::endl
00461         << "       " << min-chi2init << std::endl;
00462     }
00463   }
00464   
00465   std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00466   myClock.Stop();
00467   myClock.Print();
00468   std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00469 
00470   //  std::cout << "[INFO] Level " << iProfile << " variable:" << var->GetName() << "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << min << std::endl;
00471 
00472 
00473 
00474   //floating the scales
00475   RooArgList     argList(floatingVars);
00476   it_ = argList.createIterator();
00477   for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next(); var != NULL; var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next()){
00478     var->setConstant(kFALSE);
00479   }
00480   delete it_;
00481 
00482   delete mcChain;
00483   delete tree;
00484   delete entrylist;
00485   
00486   return changed;
00487 }

00489 
00490 void Smooth(TH2F *h, Int_t ntimes, Option_t *option)
00491 {
00492    Double_t k5a[5][5] =  { { 0, 0, 1, 0, 0 },
00493                            { 0, 2, 2, 2, 0 },
00494                            { 1, 2, 5, 2, 1 },
00495                            { 0, 2, 2, 2, 0 },
00496                            { 0, 0, 1, 0, 0 } };
00497    Double_t k5b[5][5] =  { { 0, 1, 2, 1, 0 },
00498                            { 1, 2, 4, 2, 1 },
00499                            { 2, 4, 8, 4, 2 },
00500                            { 1, 2, 4, 2, 1 },
00501                            { 0, 1, 2, 1, 0 } };
00502    Double_t k3a[3][3] =  { { 0, 1, 0 },
00503                            { 1, 2, 1 },
00504                            { 0, 1, 0 } };
00505 
00506    //  if (ntimes > 1) {
00507    // Warning("Smooth","Currently only ntimes=1 is supported");
00508    //   }
00509    TString opt = option;
00510    opt.ToLower();
00511    Int_t ksize_x=5;
00512    Int_t ksize_y=5;
00513    Double_t *kernel = &k5a[0][0];
00514    if (opt.Contains("k5b")) kernel = &k5b[0][0];
00515    if (opt.Contains("k3a")) {
00516       kernel = &k3a[0][0];
00517       ksize_x=3;
00518       ksize_y=3;
00519    }
00520 
00521    // find i,j ranges
00522    Int_t ifirst = h->GetXaxis()->GetFirst();
00523    Int_t ilast  = h->GetXaxis()->GetLast();
00524    Int_t jfirst = h->GetYaxis()->GetFirst();
00525    Int_t jlast  = h->GetYaxis()->GetLast();
00526 
00527    // Determine the size of the bin buffer(s) needed
00528    //Double_t nentries = h->GetEntries();
00529    Int_t nx = h->GetNbinsX();
00530    Int_t ny = h->GetNbinsY();
00531    Int_t bufSize  = (nx+2)*(ny+2);
00532    Double_t *buf  = new Double_t[bufSize];
00533    Double_t *ebuf = 0;
00534    if (h->GetSumw2()->fN) ebuf = new Double_t[bufSize];
00535 
00536    // Copy all the data to the temporary buffers
00537    Int_t i,j,bin;
00538    for (i=ifirst; i<=ilast; i++){
00539       for (j=jfirst; j<=jlast; j++){
00540          bin = h->GetBin(i,j);
00541          buf[bin] =h->GetBinContent(bin);
00542          if (ebuf) ebuf[bin]=h->GetBinError(bin);
00543       }
00544    }
00545 
00546    // Kernel tail sizes (kernel sizes must be odd for this to work!)
00547    Int_t x_push = (ksize_x-1)/2;
00548    Int_t y_push = (ksize_y-1)/2;
00549 
00550    // main work loop
00551    for (i=ifirst; i<=ilast; i++){
00552       for (j=jfirst; j<=jlast; j++) {
00553          Double_t content = 0.0;
00554          Double_t error = 0.0;
00555          Double_t norm = 0.0;
00556          if(h->GetBinContent(i,j)<=0) continue;
00557          for (Int_t n=0; n<ksize_x; n++) {
00558             for (Int_t m=0; m<ksize_y; m++) {
00559                Int_t xb = i+(n-x_push);
00560                Int_t yb = j+(m-y_push);
00561                if ( (xb >= 1) && (xb <= nx) && (yb >= 1) && (yb <= ny)) {
00562                   bin = h->GetBin(xb,yb);
00563                   if(buf[bin]>0){
00564                   Double_t k = kernel[n*ksize_y +m];
00565                   //if ( (k != 0.0 ) && (buf[bin] != 0.0) ) { // General version probably does not want the second condition
00566                   if ( k != 0.0 ) {
00567                      norm    += k;
00568                      content += k*buf[bin];
00569                      if (ebuf) error   += k*k*buf[bin]*buf[bin];
00570                   }
00571                   }
00572                }
00573             }
00574          }
00575 
00576          if ( norm != 0.0 ) {
00577             h->SetBinContent(i,j,content/norm);
00578             if (ebuf) {
00579                error /= (norm*norm);
00580                h->SetBinError(i,j,sqrt(error));
00581             }
00582          }
00583       }
00584    }
00585    //fEntries = nentries;
00586 
00587    delete [] buf;
00588    delete [] ebuf;
00589 }
00590 
00591 bool stopFindMin1D(Int_t i, Int_t iLocMin, Double_t chi2, Double_t min, Double_t locmin, float phiMin=2){
00592   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>2 && chi2-min > 300){ std::cout << "stop 1" << std::endl; return true;}
00593   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>5 && chi2-min > 200){ std::cout << "stop 2" << std::endl; return true;}
00594 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>6 && chi2-locmin > 120){ std::cout << "stop 3" << std::endl; return true;}
00595 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>7 && chi2-locmin > 80){ std::cout << "stop 4" << std::endl; return true;}
00596 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>8 && chi2-locmin > 50){ std::cout << "stop 8" << std::endl; return true;}
00597 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>9 && chi2-locmin > 20){ std::cout << "stop 9" << std::endl; return true;}
00598 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>10 && chi2-locmin > 10){ std::cout << "stop 10" << std::endl; return true;}
00599 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>11 && chi2-locmin > 5){ std::cout << "stop 11" << std::endl; return true;}
00600 //   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>12 && chi2-locmin > 3){ std::cout << "stop 12" << std::endl; return true;}
00601 
00602   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>3 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*20){ std::cout << "stop 3" << std::endl; return true;}
00603   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>4 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*10){ std::cout << "stop 4" << std::endl; return true;}
00604   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>5 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*5){ std::cout << "stop 8" << std::endl; return true;}
00605   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>6 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*4){ std::cout << "stop 9" << std::endl; return true;}
00606   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>7 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*3){ std::cout << "stop 10" << std::endl; return true;}
00607   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>8 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*2){ std::cout << "stop 10" << std::endl; return true;}
00608   if(abs(i-iLocMin)>9 && chi2-locmin > phiMin*1){ std::cout << "stop 10" << std::endl; return true;}
00609 
00610   return false;
00611 }
00612 
00613 Int_t FindMin1D(RooRealVar *var, Double_t *X, Int_t N, Int_t iMinStart, Double_t min, RooSmearer& smearer, bool update=true, Double_t *Y=NULL, RooRealVar *var2=NULL, Double_t *X2=NULL){
00614   //Double_t vInit=var->getVal();
00615   var->setVal(X[iMinStart]);
00616   float phiMin=1;
00617   if(var2!=NULL){ 
00618     var2->setVal(X2[iMinStart]);
00619     phiMin=5;
00620   }
00621   TString varName = var->GetName();
00622   if(varName.Contains("constTerm") || varName.Contains("alpha")){
00623     phiMin=2;
00624   }
00625   if(Y==NULL) exit(1);
00626 
00627   Double_t chi2, chi2init=smearer.evaluate(); //, chi2old=chi2init; 
00628 
00629   Double_t locmin=1e20;
00630   Int_t iLocMin=iMinStart;
00631 
00632   Double_t NY[PROFILE_NBINS]={0.}; 
00633   int iStep=1;
00634   for(Int_t i =iMinStart; i <N; i+=iStep){ //loop versus positive side
00635     var->setVal(X[i]);
00636     if(var2!=NULL) var2->setVal(X2[i]);
00637     chi2=smearer.evaluate(); 
00638     Y[i] += chi2;
00639     NY[i]++;
00640   
00641     //iStep = chi2-chi2old != 0 ? std::max(1,((int) (fabs(0.1/(chi2-chi2old))))) : 1;
00642     iStep=1;
00643     if(var2!=NULL) std::cout << "[DEBUG] "  << std::setprecision(3) <<  "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << "\t" << 
00644       chi2-chi2init << "\t" << locmin-chi2init << "\t" << min-chi2init << std::endl;
00645     else std::cout  << std::setprecision(4) << "[DEBUG] " <<  "\t" << iStep << "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << chi2-chi2init << "\t" << locmin-chi2init << "\t" << min-chi2init << "\tchi2= " <<  chi2 << std::endl;
00646     if(chi2<=locmin){ //local minimum
00647         iLocMin=i;
00648         locmin=chi2;
00649     }
00650       
00651     if(stopFindMin1D(i,iLocMin, chi2, min, locmin, phiMin)) break;
00652     //chi2old=chi2;
00653     if(i==iLocMin && i-iMinStart==3 && Y[iMinStart]==Y[iMinStart+1] && Y[iMinStart]==Y[iMinStart+2] && Y[iMinStart]==Y[iMinStart+3]){
00654       std::cerr << "[WARNING] No sensitivity to variable: " << var->GetName() << std::endl;
00655       std::cerr << "          Variable changed to constant" << std::endl;
00656       std::cout << "[WARNING] No sensitivity to variable: " << var->GetName() << std::endl;
00657       std::cout << "          Variable changed to constant" << std::endl;
00658       return -1;
00659     }
00660   }
00661 
00662   iStep=1;
00663   for(Int_t i =iMinStart; i >=0; i-=iStep){ //loop versus positive side
00664     var->setVal(X[i]);
00665     if(var2!=NULL) var2->setVal(X2[i]);
00666     chi2=smearer.evaluate(); 
00667     Y[i] += chi2;
00668     NY[i]++;
00669 
00670     //iStep = chi2-chi2old != 0 ? std::max(1,((int) (fabs(0.1/(chi2-chi2old))))) : 1;
00671     iStep=1;
00672 #ifdef DEBUG      
00673     //if(update==true) 
00674       std::cout << "[DEBUG] " <<  "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << chi2-chi2init << "\t" << locmin-chi2init << std::endl;
00675 #endif
00676     if(var2!=NULL) std::cout <<   "[DEBUG] Neg"  << std::setprecision(3) <<  "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << "\t" << 
00677       chi2-chi2init << "\t" << locmin-chi2init << "\t" << min-chi2init << std::endl;
00678     else std::cout << std::setprecision(4) << "[DEBUG] Neg" <<  "\t" <<  iStep << "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << chi2-chi2init << "\t" << locmin-chi2init << "\t" << min-chi2init << std::endl;
00679 
00680     if(chi2<=locmin){ //local minimum
00681         iLocMin=i;
00682         locmin=chi2;
00683     } 
00684 
00685     if(stopFindMin1D(i,iLocMin, chi2, min, locmin, phiMin)) break;
00686     //chi2old=chi2;
00687   }
00688 
00689   if(Y!=NULL){  //take the mean!
00690     for(Int_t i =0; i < N; i++){ 
00691       if(NY[i]!=0) Y[i] /= NY[i];
00692     }
00693   }
00694 
00695   return iLocMin;
00696 }
00697 
00698 bool MinProfile(RooRealVar *var, RooSmearer& smearer, int iProfile, 
00699                 Double_t min_old, Double_t& min, double rho=0, double Emean=0, bool update=true, bool dscan=false){ 
00700   bool changed=false;
00701 
00702   Double_t v1=var->getVal();
00703   //Double_t chi2init=
00704   smearer.evaluate();  
00705 
00706   std::cout << "[STATUS] Starting MinProfile for " << var->GetName() << "\t" << iProfile << std::endl;
00707   TGraph        *profil = GetProfile(var, smearer, iProfile, false, false, rho, Emean);
00708   //TGraphErrors         g(profil->GetN(),profil->GetX(), profil->GetY());
00709 
00710 
00711   Double_t      *X    = profil->GetX();
00712   Double_t      *Y    = profil->GetY();
00713   Int_t          N    = profil->GetN();
00714 
00715   Double_t chi2=Y[0];
00716 
00717 
00718   Int_t iMin_=0; // minimum of the graph
00719 
00720   for(Int_t i2=0; i2 < N; i2++){ // reset Y values
00721     Y[i2]=0;
00722     if(X[iMin_] < v1) iMin_++;
00723   }
00724   iMin_= FindMin1D(var, X, N, iMin_, min, smearer, true, Y);
00725   if(iMin_<0){ // in case of no sensitivity to the variable it is put has constant and the minimization is interrupted
00726     var->setVal(v1);
00727     var->setConstant();
00728     return false;
00729   }
00730   chi2=Y[iMin_];
00731 
00732   var->setVal(v1); //reset to initial value
00733  
00734   if(chi2<min){ // updated absolute minimum
00735     min=chi2; 
00736     if(var->getVal() != X[iMin_]) changed=true; //the value has been updated, need a new iteration
00737     //else a fluctuation changed the min value
00738    }
00739 
00740   if(update && (min<min_old || changed)) { // if a new minimum has been found now, or due to another variable, need to update the scale
00741     std::cout << "[INFO] Updating variable:" << var->GetName() << " from " << v1 << " to " << X[iMin_]  << std::endl
00742               << "       min = " << min << "; Y[iMin_]-min =  " << Y[iMin_]-min << std::endl;
00743     var->setVal(X[iMin_]);
00744     //var->setError(newError);
00745   } else{
00746     std::cout << "[INFO] Not-Updating variable:" << var->GetName() << "\t" << X[iMin_] 
00747               << " " << min << " " << Y[iMin_]-min << std::endl;
00748   }   
00749   //  std::cout << "[INFO] Level " << iProfile << " variable:" << var->GetName() << "\t" << var->getVal() << "\t" << min << std::endl;
00750   delete profil;
00751   //  delete X;
00752   //delete Y;
00753   return changed;
00754 }
00755 
00759 bool MinProfile2D(RooRealVar *var1, RooRealVar *var2, RooSmearer& smearer, int iProfile, 
00760                   Double_t min_old, Double_t& min, double& rho, double& Emean, bool update=true, bool dscan=false){ 
00761 #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00762   ProcInfo_t info;
00763   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00764   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO AT MinProfile2D START " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00765 #endif
00766 
00767   bool changed=false;
00768   std::cout << "------------------------------ MinProfile2D: iProfile==" << iProfile << std::endl;
00769 
00770   std::cout << "--------------------------------- Init eval "  << std::endl;
00771   //initial values
00772   Double_t v1=var1->getVal();
00773   Double_t v2=var2->getVal();
00774   smearer.evaluate();
00775   Double_t chi2; //, chi2init=smearer.evaluate(); 
00776   Double_t locmin=1e20;
00777 
00778   TStopwatch myClock;
00779   myClock.Start();
00780 
00781   var2->setVal(0);
00782   var1->setVal(sqrt(v1*v1+v2*v2/50));
00783   changed+=MinProfile(var1, smearer, -1, min_old, locmin); // best DeltaC with DeltaS=0
00784   // rho = best DeltaC with DeltaS=0
00785   rho = var1->getVal();
00786 
00787   locmin=1e20;
00788   var1->setVal(0);
00789   var2->setVal(rho*7);
00790   MinProfile(var2, smearer, -1, min_old, locmin); // best DeltaS with DeltaC=0
00791   
00792   //sqrt(<E>) = DeltaS/DeltaC
00793   Emean = var2->getVal()/rho;
00794 
00795   std::cout << "--------------------------------- GetProfile for " << var1->GetName() << std::endl;
00796   TGraph        *g1 = GetProfile(var1, smearer, iProfile, false, false, rho, Emean); // take only the binning
00797   std::cout << "--------------------------------- GetProfile for " << var2->GetName() << std::endl;
00798   TGraph        *g2 = GetProfile(var2, smearer, iProfile, false, false, rho, Emean); // take only the binning
00799   
00800   Double_t      *X1    = g1->GetX();
00801   Double_t      *X2    = g2->GetX();
00802   Int_t          N    = g1->GetN();
00803 
00804   if(N!=g2->GetN()){
00805     std::cerr << "[ERROR] N1!=N2 for phi minimization: " << N << "\t"<<g2->GetN() << std::endl;
00806     exit(1);
00807   }
00808 
00809 
00810   Double_t *Y = g1->GetY();
00811 
00812   //Int_t iLocMin1=0, iLocMin2, 
00813   Int_t iLocMin2Prev=10;
00814   //Double_t      Y2[PROFILE_NBINS];
00815   for(Int_t i2=0; i2 < N; i2++){ // reset Y values
00816     Y[i2]=0;
00817     //    if(X1[iLocMin2Prev]<v1) iLocMin2Prev++;
00818   }
00819 
00820 
00821   std::cout << "[STATUS] Starting MinProfile for " << "phi" << "\t" << iProfile << "\t" << iLocMin2Prev << std::endl;
00822   Int_t iMin_=-1; // minimum of the graph
00823   locmin=1e20;
00824   //find minimum
00825   iMin_= FindMin1D(var1, X1, N, iLocMin2Prev, locmin, smearer, true, Y, var2, X2);
00826   if(iMin_<0){ // in case of no sensitivity to the variable it is put has constant and the minimization is interrupted
00827     var1->setVal(v1);
00828     var1->setConstant();
00829     var2->setVal(v2);
00830     var2->setConstant();
00831     return false;
00832   }
00833 
00834   chi2=Y[iMin_];
00835   // reset initial values
00836   var1->setVal(v1);
00837   var2->setVal(v2);
00838 
00839   if(chi2<min){ // updated absolute minimum
00840     min=chi2; 
00841     if(var1->getVal() != X1[iMin_]) changed=true; //the value has been updated, need a new iteration
00842     if(var2->getVal() != X2[iMin_]) changed=true; //the value has been updated, need a new iteration
00843    }
00844 
00845   myClock.Stop();
00846   myClock.Print();
00847 
00848   //------------------------------ making the 2D scan around the minimum
00849   if(update==false && dscan==true){
00850     myClock.Start();
00851     var1->setVal(X1[iMin_]);
00852     var2->setVal(X2[iMin_]);
00853     TGraph      *G1 = GetProfile(var1, smearer, -1, false, false); // take only the binning
00854     TGraph      *G2 = GetProfile(var2, smearer, -1, false, false); // take only the binning
00855     Double_t *XG1 = G1->GetX();
00856     Double_t *XG2 = G2->GetX();
00857     Int_t iBin1=0, iBin2=0; 
00858     
00859 
00860     while(XG1[iBin1]<X1[iMin_]){ //nearest bin to the minimum
00861       //std::cout << "[DEBUG] Nearest bin to minimum: " << iBin1 << "\t" << XG1[iBin1] << "  " << X1[iMin_] << std::endl;
00862       iBin1++;
00863     }
00864     while(XG2[iBin2]<X2[iMin_]){ //nearest bin to the minimum
00865       //std::cout << "[DEBUG] Nearest bin to minimum: " << iBin2 << "\t" << XG2[iBin2] << "  " << X2[iMin_] << std::endl;
00866       iBin2++;
00867     }
00868     Int_t iBin1min= std::max(iBin1-6,0);
00869     Int_t iBin2min= std::max(iBin2-6,0);
00870     Int_t iBin1max= std::min(iBin1+6,G1->GetN());
00871     Int_t iBin2max= std::min(iBin2+6,G1->GetN());
00872     
00873     //Int_t iBin1_ = iBin1, iBin2_=iBin2, 
00874     Int_t iBinM=(int)(sqrt(iBin1*iBin1+iBin2*iBin2));
00875     
00876     iBin1min=0;
00877     iBin1max=G1->GetN();
00878     iBin2min=0;
00879     iBin2max=G1->GetN();
00880     std::cout << "[INFO] " << "iBin1min = " << iBin1min << std::endl
00881               << "       " << "iBin1max = " << iBin1max << std::endl
00882               << "       " << "iBin2min = " << iBin2min << std::endl
00883               << "       " << "iBin2max = " << iBin2max << std::endl;
00884 
00885     for(iBin1=iBin1min; iBin1<iBin1max; iBin1++){
00886       var1->setVal(XG1[iBin1]);
00887       for(iBin2=iBin2min; iBin2<iBin2max; iBin2++){
00888         if(sqrt(iBin1*iBin1+Emean * iBin2*iBin2) < iBinM-10) continue;
00889         if(sqrt(iBin1*iBin1+Emean * iBin2*iBin2) > iBinM+10) continue;
00890         var2->setVal(XG2[iBin2]);
00891         smearer.evaluate();
00892         std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << XG1[iBin1] << "\t" << XG2[iBin2] << "\t" << smearer.evaluate()-chi2 << std::endl;
00893       }
00894     }
00895     
00896     myClock.Stop();
00897     myClock.Print();
00898     delete G1;
00899     delete G2;
00900 //     delete XG1;
00901 //     delete XG2;
00902     var1->setVal(v1);
00903     var2->setVal(v2);
00904   }
00905 
00906 
00907   if(update && (min<min_old || changed)) { 
00908     // if a new minimum has been found now, or due to another variable, need to update the scale
00909     std::cout << "[INFO] Updating variable:" << var1->GetName() << "\t" << X1[iMin_] 
00910               << "\t" << var2->GetName() << "\t" << X2[iMin_] 
00911               << " " << min << " " << Y[iMin_]-min << std::endl;
00912     var1->setVal(X1[iMin_]);
00913     var2->setVal(X2[iMin_]);
00914   } else{
00915     std::cout << "[INFO] Not-Updating variable:" << var1->GetName() << "\t" << X1[iMin_]  << std::endl
00916               << "                             " << var2->GetName() << "\t" << X2[iMin_]  << std::endl
00917               << " " << min << " " << Y[iMin_]-min << std::endl;
00918   }   
00919   std::cout << "[INFO] Level " << iProfile << " variable:" << var1->GetName() << "\t" << var1->getVal() << "\t" << min << std::endl;
00920   std::cout << "[INFO] Level " << iProfile << " variable:" << var2->GetName() << "\t" << var2->getVal() << "\t" << min << std::endl;
00921 
00922   delete g1;
00923   delete g2;
00924 #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00925   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00926   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO JUST BEFORE END MinProfile2D " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00927 #endif
00928 
00929   return changed;
00930 }
00931 
00932 
00933   
00934 
00935 
00936 void MinimizationProfile(RooSmearer& smearer, RooArgSet args, long unsigned int nIterMCMC, bool mcmc=false){
00937   std::cout << "------------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
00938   std::cout << "[INFO] Minimization: profile" << std::endl;
00939   std::cout << "[INFO] Re-initialize nllMin: 1e20"  << std::endl;
00940   smearer.nllMin=1e20;
00941 
00942   std::cout << "[INFO] Setting initial evaluation" << std::endl;
00943   smearer.evaluate();
00944   Double_t      min_old     = 9999999999.;
00945   Double_t      min         = 999999999.;
00946   bool  updateError = false;
00947   int nIter=0;
00948   TStopwatch myClock;
00949   myClock.Start();
00950   
00951   std::cout << "[INFO] Starting scale minimization" << std::endl;
00952   RooArgList     argList_(args);
00953   TIterator     *it_   = NULL;
00954   while((min < min_old || updateError==true) && nIter <3){
00955     updateError=false;
00956     TStopwatch iterClock;
00957     iterClock.Start();
00958     if(min < min_old) min_old=min;
00959     it_ = argList_.createIterator();
00960     for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next(); var != NULL; var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next()){
00961       if (var->isConstant() || !var->isLValue()) continue;
00962       TString  name(var->GetName());
00963       if(!name.Contains("scale")) continue; // looping only for the scale
00964       updateError += MinProfile(var, smearer, -1, min_old, min);
00965     }
00966     delete it_;
00967     iterClock.Stop();
00968     std::cout << "[INFO] nIter scale: " << nIter;
00969     iterClock.Print();
00970     nIter++;
00971   }
00972 
00973   std::cout << "[STATUS] Scale minimization done";
00974   std::cout << "------------------------------" << std::endl;
00975   std::cout << "[STATUS] Smearing + scale minimization starting" << std::endl;
00976 
00977   //minimization of additional smearing
00978   updateError=true;
00979   min_old = min;
00980   nIter=0;
00981   while((min < min_old && nIter < 5) || (updateError==true && nIter <2)){
00982     updateError=false;
00983     TStopwatch iterClock;
00984     iterClock.Start();
00985     it_= argList_.createIterator();
00986     if(min < min_old) min_old=min;
00987     for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next(); var!=NULL; var = (RooRealVar*)it_->Next()){
00988       if (var->isConstant()) continue;
00989       TString  name(var->GetName());
00990       // special part for alpha fitting 
00991       TString  alphaName=name; alphaName.ReplaceAll("constTerm","alpha");
00992       RooRealVar *var2= name.Contains("constTerm") ? (RooRealVar *)argList_.find(alphaName): NULL;
00993       if(name.Contains("alpha")) continue; //if alpha parameter exists, need a 2D scan
00994       //if(var2!=NULL && var2->isConstant()) var2=NULL; // to use MinProfile 1D instead of 2D
00995       //taking large profile
00996       if(var2==NULL || var2->isConstant()) MinProfile(var, smearer, -1, min_old, min); //updateError += MinProfile(var, smearer, iProfile, min_old, min);
00997       else { 
00998         //if(mcmc && iProfile>2) updateError += MinMCMC2D(var, var2, smearer, iProfile, min_old, min, nIterMCMC);
00999         //  else 
01000         double rho=0, Emean=0;
01001         updateError+=MinProfile2D(var, var2, smearer, -1, min_old, min, rho, Emean);
01002       }
01003     }
01004     delete it_;
01005     iterClock.Stop();
01006     std::cout << "[DEBUG] nIter= " << nIter << "\t"; iterClock.Print();
01007     nIter++;
01008     smearer.GetParams().writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
01009   }
01010 }

01101 void ShervinMinuit::Propose(RooArgSet& xPrime, RooArgSet& x){
01102   TIterator *it=NULL; 
01103 //   RooRealVar v1("v1","",0.01,0,0.04);
01104 //   RooRealVar v2("v2","",0.02,0,0.04);
01105 //   RooArgSet arg1(v1);

01109     fSigmaRangeDivisor=4;
01110     RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *)x.find("constTerm_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25");
01111     float varErr = (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor;
01112     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor 
01113               << "\t" << var->getVal() << ": " << var->getMin() << " - " << var->getMax() << "\t" << varErr
01114               << std::endl;
01115   }    
01116   else if(_iStep==50){
01117     fSigmaRangeDivisor=10;
01118     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor << std::endl;
01119     RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *)x.find("constTerm_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25");
01120     float varErr = (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor;
01121     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor 
01122               << "\t" << var->getVal() << ": " << var->getMin() << " - " << var->getMax() << "\t" << varErr
01123               << std::endl;
01124 
01125   }
01126   else if(_iStep==80){
01127     fSigmaRangeDivisor=15;
01128     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor << std::endl;
01129     RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *)x.find("constTerm_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25");
01130     float varErr = (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor;
01131     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor 
01132               << "\t" << var->getVal() << ": " << var->getMin() << " - " << var->getMax() << "\t" << varErr
01133               << std::endl;
01134     var = (RooRealVar *)x.find("scale_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25");
01135     varErr = (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor;
01136     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor 
01137               << "\t" << var->getVal() << ": " << var->getMin() << " - " << var->getMax() << "\t" << varErr
01138               << std::endl;
01139 
01140  //  }  else if(_iStep==100){
01141 //     fSigmaRangeDivisor=20;
01142 //     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor << std::endl;
01143 //     RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *)x.find("constTerm_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25");
01144 //     float varErr = (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor;
01145 //     std::cout << "[INFO] Changing sigma divisor to: " << fSigmaRangeDivisor 
01146 //            << "\t" << var->getVal() << ": " << var->getMin() << " - " << var->getMax() << "\t" << varErr
01147 //            << std::endl;
01148 
01149   }
01150 
01151 
01152   //else if(_iStep==100) fSigmaRangeDivisor=10;
01153 
01154   it = RooArgList(xPrime).createIterator();
01155   int index=0;
01156   for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); var!=NULL;
01157       var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next()){
01158     
01159     //var->setError(var->getError()/100);
01160

01163     rmsHist[index]->Fill(v_x->getVal());
01164 
01165     float varErr = std::min(rmsHist[index]->GetRMS(), (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/fSigmaRangeDivisor);
01166 
01167 
01168     if(fSigmaRangeDivisor<3)     var->setVal(gen.Uniform(v_x->getMin(), v_x->getMax()));
01169     else {
01170       if(varErr < (var->getMax()-var->getMin())/100) std::cout << "[WARNING] " << varErr << std::endl;
01171       var->setVal(gen.Gaus(
01172                            ((RooRealVar *)x.find(var->GetName()))->getVal(), 
01173                            varErr)
01174                   );
01175     }
01176     
01177 //     if(TString(var->GetName())=="constTerm_EB-absEta_0_1-gold-Et_25"){
01178 //       std::cout << var->GetName() << "\t" << v_x->getVal() << " --> " << var->getVal() << "\t" << varErr << std::endl;
01179 //     }
01180     index++;
01181   }
01182 
01183   _iStep++;
01184   return;
01185 
01186 
01187   
01188   if(_iStep == _nBurnSteps){
01189     std::cout << "Now Gaussian proposal" << std::endl;
01190 
01191     it = xPrime.createIterator();
01192     for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); var!=NULL;
01193         var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next()){

01198       //var->setMax(std::min(var->getMax(),var->getVal()+ varErr*3));

01200       var->setMax(0.05);
01201       //var->setVal(0.03);
01202       std::cout << var -> GetName() << "\t" << var->getError() << "\t" << var -> getMin() << "\t" << var->getMax()<< std::endl;
01203     }
01204     //_m->hesse();
01205     //RooFitResult *fitres = _m->save();
01206   }

01208 
01209 Double_t asymmetricParabola(Double_t* x,Double_t* par)
01210 {
01211   // qualche commento non farebbe male
01212   Double_t value=0.;
01213   if (x[0]<=par[1])
01214     value=par[2]*(x[0]-par[1])*(x[0]-par[1]);
01215   else
01216     value=par[3]*(x[0]-par[1])*(x[0]-par[1]);
01217   return value+par[0];
01218 }
01219 
01220 TF1* IterMinimumFit(TGraphErrors *g, RooRealVar *xVar)
01221 {
01222   double range_min;// = min-40*sigma;
01223   double range_max;// = min+30*sigma;   
01224   
01225   Double_t *X = g->GetX();
01226   Double_t X_bin=fabs(X[1]-X[0]);
01227 
01228   range_min=TMath::Max(TMath::MinElement(g->GetN(),g->GetX()),xVar->getMin());
01229   range_max=TMath::Min(TMath::MaxElement(g->GetN(),g->GetX()),xVar->getMax());
01230   
01231   g->Fit("pol2","0FR+","",range_min,range_max);
01232   TFitResult fitres;
01233 
01234   TF1 *fun = (TF1*) g->GetListOfFunctions()->At(g->GetListOfFunctions()->GetSize()-1);
01235   if(fun==NULL){
01236     std::cerr << "Error: polynomial fit function not defined" << std::endl;
01237     exit(1);
01238   }
01239   fun->SetRange(range_min,range_max);
01240   fun->GetRange(range_min, range_max);
01241 #ifdef DEBUG
01242   fun->Print();
01243 #endif
01244   //fun->SetRange(0.95,1.04);
01245   //  double sigma_old; 
01246 
01247   //  double sigma=1./sqrt(2* fun->GetParameter(2));
01248   //  double minX=-fun->GetParameter(1) / (2* fun->GetParameter(2));
01249   // double sigma=(range_max-range_min)/2;
01250   double sigma=1./sqrt(2* fun->GetParameter(2));
01251   double sigma_plus=sigma;
01252   double sigma_minus=sigma;
01253   double minX=g->GetX()[TMath::LocMin(g->GetN(),g->GetY())];
01254 
01255   double old_chi2=0., chi2=0.;
01256    
01257   //  range_max=range_min+0.01;
01258   TF1* f2 = new TF1("f2",asymmetricParabola,range_min,range_max,4);
01259   f2->SetParameter(0,TMath::MinElement(g->GetN(),g->GetY()));
01260   f2->SetParameter(1,minX);
01261   f2->SetParameter(2,1/(2*sigma*sigma));
01262   f2->SetParameter(3,1/(2*sigma*sigma));
01263   int iter=0;
01264   do{
01265     old_chi2=chi2;
01266 
01267     std::cout << "Fit range: [ " << range_min << " : " << range_max << "]" << std::endl;
01268     f2->SetName("f2_iter"+iter); 
01269  
01270     //    g->Fit(fun,"F+","",range_min, range_max);   
01271     g->Fit(f2,"0R+","",range_min, range_max);   
01272     //    g->Fit(fun,"R+","",min-2*sigma, min+2*sigma);
01273     //    sigma = 1./sqrt(2* fun->GetParameter(2));
01274     sigma_minus = 1./sqrt(2* f2->GetParameter(2));
01275     sigma_plus = 1./sqrt(2* f2->GetParameter(3));
01276     //    min=- fun->GetParameter(1) / (2* fun->GetParameter(2));
01277     minX=f2->GetParameter(1);
01278     chi2 = fun->GetChisquare()/fun->GetNDF(); //g->Chisquare(fun);
01279 
01280     range_min = TMath::Max(minX-9*sigma_minus,xVar->getMin());
01281     range_max = TMath::Min(minX+12*sigma_plus,xVar->getMax());   
01282     //range_min = TMath::Max(minX-2*sigma_minus,0.);
01283     //  range_max = TMath::Min(minX+2*sigma_plus,0.07);   
01284 
01285     while (((range_max - range_min)/X_bin < 10)){
01286       // incremento del 10% i range
01287       std::cout << "[WARNING] Incrementing ranges by 20% because less than 10 points in range" << std::endl;
01288       std::cout << "Old range: [ " << range_min << " : " << range_max << "]" << std::endl;
01289       range_min-=(range_max-range_min)*0.2;
01290       range_max+=(range_max-range_min)*0.2;
01291     }
01292 
01293     f2->SetRange(range_min,range_max);
01294     //     std::cout << minX_old << " " << minX << " " << minX-minX_old << std::endl;
01295     if(sigma_plus*100 < 0.01) std::cout << "sigma_plus = " << " " << sigma_plus << std::endl;
01296     if(sigma_minus*100 < 0.01) std::cout << "sigma_minus = " << " " << sigma_minus << std::endl;
01297     iter++;
01298     f2->SetFitResult(fitres);
01299     
01300 #ifdef DEBUG
01301     std::cout << "MINUIT STATUS " << fitres.Status() << std::endl; //gMinuit->GetStatus() << std::endl;
01302     std::cout << "CHI2/NDF" << chi2 << std::endl;
01303 #endif
01304     //Rescaling graph points so that minimum iteratively goes to 0
01305     for (int iPoint=0;iPoint<g->GetN();++iPoint)
01306       *(g->GetY()+iPoint)=*(g->GetY()+iPoint)-f2->GetParameter(0);
01307     //} While( (((fabs(minX-minX_old)/minX > FIT_LIMIT || fabs(sigma_plus-sigma_plus_old)/sigma_plus>FIT_LIMIT || fabs(sigma_minus-sigma_minus_old)/sigma_minus>FIT_LIMIT )) && iter<20) || iter<10 ); 
01308   } while (fabs(chi2 - old_chi2)/old_chi2 > FIT_LIMIT && (iter < ITER_MAX || iter < 4 || fitres.Status() != 0));
01309   
01310   std::cout << "ITER to converge = " << iter << std::endl;
01311   if(iter >=ITER_MAX) std::cout << "WARNING: iter not converged" << std::endl;
01312   
01313   //  float chi2_rnd = TMath::ChisquareQuantile(gen.Rndm(),1);
01314 
01315   float errorScale=sqrt(f2->GetChisquare()/(f2->GetNumberFitPoints()-f2->GetNumberFreeParameters()));
01316   std::cout << "SCALING ERROR by " << errorScale;
01317   for (int i=0;i<g->GetN();++i)
01318     *(g->GetEY()+i)= (*(g->GetEY()+i)) * errorScale; //*chi2_rnd/TMath::ChisquareQuantile(0.5,1);
01319 
01320   
01321 
01322   return f2;
01323 }
